metadata.title: CVE-2022-41854 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Those using Snakeyaml to parse untrusted YAML files may be vulnerable toDenial of Service attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on user suppliedinput, an attacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash bystack overflow. This effect may support a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: snakeyaml package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
